alert.note: Alert for Rockingham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Rockingham County through 515 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harrisons Crossroads, or over Wentworth, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eden... Reidsville... Wentworth... Oregon Hill... Harrisons Crossroads... Ruffin... and Draper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for north central North Carolina...and south central, southwestern and west central Virginia.
